column3: Total net revenues attributable to customers located in Germany, PMI’s largest market in terms of net revenues, were $7.2 billion, $8.3 billion and $7.8 billion for the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively. Total net revenues attributable to customers located in Indonesia were $7.1 billion for the year ended December 31, 2015.
